Notes

© ℗ 2004 Sub Pop Records Give Up All songs programmed by Jimmy Tamborello (Dying Songs, BMI) Lyrics, guitars, drums, piano by Benjamin Gibbard (Fake Songs, BMI) Written, recorded, and mixed at Dying Songs (L.A.) and Computerworld (Seattle) by The Postal Service Additional recording by Chris Walla at The Hall of Justice, Spring 2002 and Spring 2003 (see tracklist) Give Up: The B-Sides All songs written by Jimmy Tamborello and Benjamin Gibbard, Dying Songs / Fake Songs (BMI) [C1] Recorded and produced at Dying Songs (L.A.) and Computerworld (Seattle) [C2] Recorded and produced 12/2002, Portland, OR [C3] Recorded and produced 11/2002, Miami, FL [D1] Published by EMI Blackwood Music, Inc / Lovely Sorts of Death Music (BMI) [D2] Additional production and remixed at Black Cat Fireworks, London E2 180g red translucent vinyl Gatefold sleeve Includes 12" x 24" poster and booklet with artwork, lyrics, and credits Hype sticker on shrink wrap: FIRST TIME ON VINYL! ★ Bonus 12" featuring all B-sides and remixes from their singles ★ 16-page booklet ★ 2-sided poster of EP art ★ 180G colored vinyl This is the 1st pressing, which is 180g red translucent vinyl This pressing does not have the note about USPS trademark on the back cover
